episodes.title: Crazy Cults That Are Still Active Today
episodes.description:
Are you curious about crazy, scary and deadly cults that still exist today? Well, you came to the right video! In this video, I discuss the 4 of the craziest cults still actively operating right now. If you like stories about crazy cults, snake cults, doomsday cults or worse, you're at the right video, trust me bro.
   
Subscribe To “Trust Me Bro” Today!

Bookmarks:

05:13 - Happy Science
12:26 - Grace Road
20:18 - Superior Universal Alignment
